channel.title: Home on Quality Bytes GmbH
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Quality Bytes GmbH

item.title: Creating users in Azure SQL DB
item.description: After creating a database under Microsoft Azure, the next step is usually to create a user who is to be authorized in the corresponding database. Unfortunately, there is currently no direct option for this in the web interface of the Azure portal. Only the admin user for the DB server can be configured there. For security reasons, however, this should not be the user with which you later access the database from your own application.

item.title: Reinforcement as Software Developer .NET, Frontend Developer Angular, Xamarin Developer or ASP.NET Core Developer wanted
item.description: This might be your new desk For our team in Sinzig at the Rhine, between Bonn and Koblenz, we are looking for several software developers with immediate effect. We develop exciting customer solutions in the web and mobile environment in a team of four developers. In doing so, we rely on modern technologies, tools, and approaches, such as ASP.NET Core Angular Xamarin Azure DevOps git Unit Testing Typescript C# We currently have various positions available.

We reserve the right to modify or delete the content, whether in full or in part, provided this does not affect our existing contractual obligations.

item.title: Document Generation
item.description: Every day, countless documents are created in offices. Contracts, invoices, quotations, status reports, vacation requests, travel requests, labels, attendance certificates, or name badges are just a few examples. Most such documents are probably created manually. So, an employee copies an old file, replaces (hopefully) all variable components of the document with the new values, saves the file, possibly exports it as a PDF, and prints it. It is obvious that this process is not only very time-consuming, but above all error-prone.

item.title: Mobile Apps
item.description: Transforming business processes to mobile devices can be a productivity boon for companies of all sizes. However, it is not enough to simply equip employees with mobile devices, i.e. smartphones and tablets, or to introduce a “bring your own device” (BYOD) strategy. It also requires specialized business apps, so-called enterprise mobile apps, which map the actual business process on a mobile basis. We at Quality Bytes GmbH have specialized in the development of mobile business applications for Android, iOS, and Windows.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: As of 21. January 2022 Privacy Policy Preamble With the following privacy policy, we would like to inform you which types of your personal data (hereinafter also abbreviated as “data”) we process for which purposes and in which scope. The privacy statement applies to all processing of personal data carried out by us, both in the context of providing our services and in particular on our websites, in mobile applications, and within external online presences, such as our social media profiles (hereinafter collectively referred to as “online services”).

item.title: Web Apps
item.description: When implementing websites and web applications, we have specialized in the Microsoft platform. In these projects, we work primarily with ASP.NET MVC and the ASP.NET Web API or ASP.NET Core. On the client, we use Angular.
